full_summary:
### Active Flight Controls for Variable Stability System Research

#### Notice Type
Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)

#### Reference Number
cb-644-66940338

#### Tender Status
Open

#### Tender Closing Date
Wednesday, November 27, 2024, at 14:00:00 (ET)

#### Expected Contract Duration
November 28, 2024 - September 30, 2025

#### Tender Description
The National Research Council Canada (NRC), through its Aerospace Research Centre, requires the supply of three (3) Active Flight Controls for Variable Stability System Research. The delivery is required in Ottawa, Ontario.

#### Notice of Opportunity
The notice is open to all qualified and interested suppliers who wish to express their interest in bidding on this contract.

#### Statement of Capabilities
Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified and available to provide the required goods or services may submit a statement of capabilities in writing to the Contracting Officer. The statement must clearly demonstrate how the supplier meets the advertised requirements.

#### Contact Information
For all inquiries or to request additional information, please contact:
France Lemelin
Senior Contracting Officer
National Research Council Canada
1200 Montreal Road
Ottawa, ON K1A 0R6
Telephone: (343) 550-6252
E-mail: France.Lemelin@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca

#### Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

#### Regions of Opportunity
* Canada

#### Regions of Delivery
* National Capital Region (NCR), Ottawa, Ontario

#### Attachment
The tender notice and contract documents are available for download at [link provided]. Suppliers must review these documents carefully to ensure they meet the requirements of this procurement.

#### Note to Suppliers
An Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) will be posted on CanadaBuys.gc.ca for a period of 15 days, allowing other suppliers to signal their interest in bidding by submitting a statement of capabilities. If no supplier submits a capable statement, the Contracting Officer may proceed with awarding the contract to the pre-identified supplier.  Suppliers are advised to review the notice carefully and submit their statements of capabilities no later than the closing date to be considered
